attributes.action: Stop Congestion charges and airport drop off charges
attributes.background: Stop Congestion £££charge and all airports drop off ££££charge

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about charges for airport services are a matter for individual airports, not the Government or Parliament. Decisions about congestion charges are a matter for local councils, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Remove local authority powers to introduce LTNs, CAZs, LEZs and ULEZs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637517
